1.content:
You run through an alley, from turn to turn. Sweats flowing down your face along with the wind gushing on its skin.
All the running starting to sore your feet a bit, the thing about running against Jack was you need to be twice faster than him. This took you back to what happened earlier…

An hour before, you were packing your stuff to be brought home as usual. Today is your birthday, your family was planning a fancy dinner at a restaurant in town. It's one of those fulfilling moments you could really eat something besides those cheap canteen foods with your cheap allowance.
“Hey Alex!” towards the loud boyish call, you turned and saw Josh stood across the hall. He was wearing a light blue shirt with short baggy pants underneath. But his attire will be changed as he’s attending Cassie’s vocal situation.
“Dude, c’mon you can’t bail on this.” Josh said, he really needs his bro (meaning you) for this. Yep, Cassie, also your best friend and always with something she had to say from her mind. Today she managed to gather some students, the goths, for a strike after school. Principal Angela published a new rule, which bans the use of gothic makeup because it opposes the school spirit. It's been a trend at your school lately and it felt consistent with your negative mood.
Other than Cassie’s urgent request, you also had a promise from your mom to be kept. It’s the birthday dinner and to have less disciplinary meetings in a year, obviously you need to avoid any means to get detention. Your lengthy explanation didn’t upset Josh even a bit though, but Cassie won’t hold her urge to debate your mom’s decency mindset after all this.
While stumbling upon anyone in need and rejecting them felt a bit harsh on you, it was replied unwantedly when you entered the parking area. You heard a bicker from a group of bulked students between yours and your motorcycle’s lane. Shit!
“And there’s the guy we're looking for.” Jack called you out of his group, the others then also turned to see you. Your feet quickly started jumping away back and through the downhill garden where the school’s logo remained seated.
Shit, shit, shit, that really had to happen?! You thought, its still the mid-semester with no football sparring between school games played and lost yet. What sort of excusable reason did they have against you now?
Back to the struggling run. You’ve passed around 10 blocks and your hip is getting soar.

“You can’t run forever Alex!” Jack’s scream blared along the tight alley. You don’t want to believe that but his tiny brain finally had some sense with something.
The only option now is to quickly pull out your phone from the shaking pocket and call Josh.
“Huh-huh-huh”
“What hap-, don’t tell me its… ?” This is Josh, your long-time best friend
“Yeah… ”
“So you could?”
“Shoot, apparently, not…” Josh mumbled… wait, not now
“Hold on Alex, we’re starting a parley with Angela…” That low-pitched feminine voice meant its Cassie
“Uh, Principal Angela, then we’ll pick you up!”
Welp, guess things worked on their end.
That’s Cassie, best friend since middle school. Today she and Josh managed to gather some students for a strike. Principal Angela published a new rule, which bans the use of Gothic makeup because it opposes the school happy spirit campaign. It's been a trend at your school lately, and to be honest you wanted to try since it felt consistent with your pessimistic mood.

You’ve been running for more than 10 blocks now. Can't really count but you feel that its more than that since there's none of that weird 'Merle' at the end of the alleys you're passing through.
At this rate, Jack will become more smarter and start branching off his buddy group and blocking your next turns.
“Left? Right? Left”
You went with your instinct and chose left, where there’s a stair going downwards. A good moment to speed up along the inconspicuous dark pitched black wall surrounding you.
“Huh, never been here before…” The stairs further went downwards, where your hand desperately tried to reach the sewer tunnel behind the gaped bars.

If I could just slip in Halfway through... Shaky, sweaty and breathing fast, just one slip through the particular bar gap and you're safe.

"Oh no you don't" A quick pull just sent you back fully to the danger end of the bar. Your body then had its back pushed against the coarse metal with a huge palm locking you in place.

Blonde mohawk haircut with a sharp gray eyed gaze and taunting smile from a rugged, cream-toned, squared faced guy.
In other words, thats Jack. Behind him there's several of the football kids lined up covering your exit.
His huge arm is slowly raising, forming a knuckle sandwich after some finger stretch and snaps.
"Well you win, again Jack, with his buddies' help, get on with it."
"Oh that's your last quips?... Let me add something to that."
A nudge on your head should dodge one, right... Dinggggg A rough skin slightly crash your ear then the metal trembles from the collision.

You could see Jack's eyes wowed open and mouth owwed at his missed punch and reacting to his bloody fist.
"Lock that little neck man!" Said one of the lined seniors.
Which he drag that heavy push from your chest and put it on to your slender neck, wrapping it tight.
The air to your throat and the swallowing saliva become an effort now. His gloating face become serious with that grit of the teeth and the sinister stare.

"Heh, sweet dreams." The knuckle sandwich takes off from its folded stance and rockets toward you.

You close your eyes and nudge your head down, hoping it to not collide your pointy nose.
.
.
.
Then nothing... your pitch black view still feel the same.
You're waiting for the knock back on your head, but it still don't come.
"Uh Jack?" Your neck was still wrapped, but there's no choke to it. Wondering of what Jack had in his tiny brain this time, you're curious to see. What you saw was rather surprising as his fist was still back near his ears.
You then study his stern face, which rather he's like sort of trapped on that expression and the gnawing open mouth.
Not to mention the lined jocks, no yell-yells or words. Just stiff as a statue.

"You're welcome?!" an old voice echoed from the tunnels, which let a scream out of your mouth.
"And that means no one heard of me yet, until you."
"What-re you..."
"Just something that you couldn't comprehend and understand."
What he said really intrigued you. Speaking like he's the higher being from those Doctor What Star Trek movies, but when you reach your best view to the back all you see is nothing but dark pitch tunnel with sewer water beneath.
"And with that here's my intention of revealing myself... entertainment."
"Entertainment?!... Wha-what's your..." What you saw behind you was just walls with the effort of twisting your head back. The possibility of prank still jumped onto your mind, possibly a dream after being knocked out that quick and hard by a big guy like Jack.
"Anyway you seem like an interesting guy, you know, little guys, many problems, and many wants with that too..."
"So I'm going to warp this 'amulet' to your neck and grant you one wish..." The bottom down your nose glows and with that there's really an amulet, hard metal and twisting hi-definition red smoke confirmed that its authentic.
"You could wish for powers to since that amulet is yours now so..." Cool, but only one wish or powers?! Come on...
"Iwishforomnipotence!" You have to test that
"BLASHPEMY!... No! Even I had a weakness." Brick hard voice shouts through the tunnels
Shit Shit Shit You get the feeling that your neck is being squashed again, turning to the front and saw Jack's knuckle-sandwich slowly travel towards your nose.

"Speaking of weakness..." The voice remarks
"...Use that interesting mind of yours to come up with one, inexplicable wish for you to claim permanently." Then further encourage you to 'wish' for something, but only permit the one thing that you really want.
Well you had plenty of wants from sorts of fiction and non-fiction references so....
"Uh-Uh-Wish for three more wi..."
"No! Don't you dare attempt to be my equal... As soon as that fist crash onto your pointy nose, your chance is gone."

Great, now its back to being tense. Your educated brain don't really help in calming down, instead giving you more streams of crazy ideas.
That huge fist is not ever going further, it feels faster than the exam's time period.

"So... What's your wish?" The voice asks again
1.title: Keep Running!!!... till...

12.content:
"How about, I wish for a power to control rea-"
"Nope"
"I wish for power to control des-"
"Nope"
"Then I wish for power to control tim-"

“NOPE !. Okay stop !, okay let's see here man. I can actually grant you all that power you wanted, but the downside or the weakness that comes with it will make you wish you were dead or at least make you can't enjoy your power. So stop thinking about them already... !." Bellow the voice with a bit anger on his tone.

This made you think and if that was the case, then it make sense. Lame genie. After that follow a pain that stabbed your whole body. Its as if a hole was punctured through your lung which made your body slowly died. You down to your knees and gasped for air. This lasted for a few moment, then the pain disappear as if it never there before. In fact, you felt refreshed.

"Insult me again and suffer for eternity..." Threaten the voice with a tone which send chill down to your spine. You felt enlighten about what you were dealing with. You calm yourself down and thought about what you want with renewed seriousness.

You thought back about the writing forum you liked to visited. There was tons of stories with weird fetishes. You actually one of guy who has weird fetish about changing people personality. The way that people behave the opposite way from how they act sense you with a weird sense of exhilaration. For a few moments, you drown at your fantasy. You snapped back to reality after a sound of defeaning finger flick.

“Your time is limited…”
“Okay, I wish for power to temper with people personality.”
“Oh, what an unusual wish. Personality was a vague yet certain, Common yet Unique, fragile yet Strong. Are you sure you wanted to temper with those things…” Asked the being as he was amused by your wish.

“Yeah, I wanted to have the power to change how people act. I wanted to control their life, whatever to my advantage or just to have fun. It's my wishes as a people of that side.” You said with conviction and pride. You could already feel the excitement about having this power. You could make your mom didn’t have to be angry with your score. You could make jack friendly or just a coward. You could your crush, crush on you. You could make all the teacher boot-licking you. Well, the last one was a bit…

“Okay, I shall grant you the power to change and add personality to people. These personality will stick permanently with the target and won’t change from anything other than you. Beware as the new personality will affect their other natural personality...”
“As for the weakness that come with it, how do you want to choose ? let me decided or you decided ?...”
12.title: Reader's wish

15.content: "So... What's your wish?" The voice asks again
15.title: More wishes

155.content: "So... What's your wish?" The voice asks again
155.title: More wishes

info.brief_description: When life gives you lemons, you gotta say your one wish quickly and then live with it!
info.description:
Alex Flander (You) is a high school student coming under a pinch of situation...
"Hey there he is, get him!" A senior spotted you, which scattered you out of the dumpster and on the run again from several bullies.

You're a 15 year old boy, living a life where everyone (except your besties) has complicated matters with you.
Living with a mom and dad and many siblings. When one had set the standards so high, your parents shifted favors by limiting your allowance.
At school, you're the one known as smart but lazy. You did have several moments of brilliance, but it's not enough to raise above average.
You like to act cool off from others's business, but with your slim and small figure the seniors seemed to favor the jokes right on you.
Whereas in life, you just want to be yourself; go with the flow and think hard when you're under a pinch, like now for instance.

Today's your 16th birthday by the way, will things finally lighten up???


Characters you frequently met:

The Flanders
You (Alex Flanders) - 16 years old first-year high school student, short, thin, auburn thin hair, blue eyes. Been passive and pessimistic ever since you wandered on an incident years ago. Always love gaming and ogling girls. You’re popular because someone spreaded hoaxes about you, which the seniors then took the fun of teasing and pranking you hard.

Madelyne 'Maddie' Flanders - 39 years old mother, average height, voluptuous body, short blonde hair, green eyes. Ranked as the most MILF of all mothers of the kids at school, and approved by all your classmates. Sweet and loving mother, stern when needed (especially after seeing bad scores),

Jerome Flanders - 45 years old father, tall, bulked, auburn hair with mutton chop, blue eyes. A busy lawyer. The reason your classmates and buddies checked twice before visiting your house. His anger trembles the house but within is a responsible, caring and smart man. Loves his wife dearly.

Ashley 'Ash' Flanders - 21 years old college student, average height, svelte body, auburn ponytail hair, green eyes. The one who set the high standard, entered college a year early and had graduated early too which set your parent’s financial focus to smoothen her future career. Even though you envied her for everything, you actually had no problems with her personally.

Maisie Flanders - 14 years old middle school student, short and developing body, long blonde hair, heterochromia eyes. Really looked up to Ash and loves to dig at your ‘go with the flow’ personality. Loves to prank and tease and use her age as a shield.

David Flanders - 10 years old first-year middle school student. Stubby, curly auburn hair, blue eyes . Exposed to porn too early after sneaking into your room, since then he secretly had a way more dirty mind when other mothers viewed him as a huggable kid. Loves ogling girls and is determined to thin his body to get one.

Your Besties - The people who you usually depend on, most of the time
Josh - 16 years old first-year high school student, average height, stout, blue-dyed hair, black eyes. Your buddy since, forever. Lives across the street. Had shared several good moments with you, especially from his goofy and mischievous quests.

Cassie - 16 years old first-year high school student, average height, slender, short black hair, blue eyes. Walks a fine line between cool and nerd, smart too and loves being vocal of everything. Loves getting people back on their feet. Some say she had a secret crush on you.

Notable Seniors
Jack - 17 years old high school student, tall, bulk, blonde mohawk hair, gray eyes. Captain of the constantly losing football team. Been your worst nightmare for years since you caught him on a secret sex act, should’ve brought a camera that day. Loves to gang up on you, especially after the football team lost again, watch out.

Paulina - 17 years old high school student, average height, svelte body with notable ample assets, long blonde hair, blue eyes. Loves everything on her ‘high standards’ and dislikes anything less. The meanest of the three hotties (Tori and Mandy), you really hope she lightens those high-pitched yells and temper because you’re in the hots for her.

Lauren - 16 years old, tall, willowy, curly brunette hair, amber eyes. She’s an ‘Ashley’ in the making, smart and hot figured, though has a snide personality that grinds your gears.

Notable Teachers
Mr. Simpson - 28 years old, average height, muscled, brown crew haircut, brown eyes. Math teacher with a strict attitude. Once you’re late to his class, you rather wish you’re absent.

Miss Madison - 27 years old, average height, hourglass figure, ponytail brunette hair, hazel eyes. History teacher with a bright personality plus the hot body to keep the class going. Loves to choose demotivated students as volunteers.

Principal Angela - 32 years old, tall, voluptuous figure, black bob haircut, hazel eyes. Warm and prim personality, at least that's what you saw during the parent meetings.

Strangers and Freaks
Merle - 50 something years old, alley bum, average height, thin, overgrown graying hair, unknown eyes. Don’t really know what’s up with him and he seemed to be in every alley you’re passing through. Offers advice and ‘treasures’.

Nestor - 16 years old first-year high school student, short, lean, black bowl haircut, black eyes. Smart and devious, wants to get on the senior’s good side by any means necessary such as being their tool for homework and cheat sheets.

Note before adding
- Keep being Alex
- No omnipotent wishes and No request more wishes
- Superpower wishes must have a weakness, even Superman has it.
- Try to keep additions to an appropriate length. At least 2,000 characters (unless it really can't be helped. i.e. Character options). Short chapters that add nothing to the story will be deleted.
- With that please describe the event as much as possible, it'll entice the readers and help visualize the story.
- You're free to add new characters, describe them and tell their background the best you can.
- Please keep names, descriptions, and events consistent
